WorkItem.Description: When I am looking for upgrades for a Shadow Priest I notice DPS Tier 9 Gear is worse than the Healing T9 Gear.  I even equipped a weapon with no hit to make sure it was not because of hit but when "Zabra's Mantle of Conquest" (DPS) is near the bottom of the list with a 221.56 vs "Zabra's Shoulderpads of Conquest" (Healing) near the top of the list with a 390.20 i would say something is wrong. the only t9 gear i have set is "Zabra's Circlet of Conquest" (DPS) on the head which means I should get the 2 piece of t9 gear bonus and make the DPS set much better.
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] T9 Healing is worth more than T9 DPS Shoulders

Comments.Message:
1) What luckton said
2) http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=IDontUnderstandWhy
3) Look at your Buffs > Set Bonuses chart and tell me the value you see for the T9 2P Bonus, is it negative?

I apologize for your loss of time on this, I restarted rawr once and got the same issue and then restarted again when i went to read the "i don't understand why" page and the 3rd time i restarted it started working, and now I can't get it to replicate. 
Thank you for your patience and this wonderful program.
